com.stremebase.field

Class VarField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stremebase.dal.Field
      • com.stremebase.field.VarField

  • public class VarField
extends Field
    A field to store global database variables efficiently

    Variable names are strings of at most 8 characters, where characters must belong to the ascii 256-range.

    Author:
    olli

    • Method Detail

      • createOrGet

        public <T> T createOrGet(String variable,
                         Class<?> valueClass,
                         T defaultValue)
        Read the variable with this first. A read variable is then managed in an in-memory hashmap.
        Parameters:
        variable - the name of the variable
        valueClass - the Class of the variable
        defaultValue - the value to store if nothing is yet stored
        Returns:
        the value

      • get

        public <T> T get(String variable)
        Gets the variable
        Parameters:
        variable - the name
        Returns:
        the value

      • set

        public <T> void set(String variable,
                    T value)
        Sets the variable, flushes instantly to disk
        Parameters:
        variable - the name
        value - the value

public void addIndex(byte indexType)
